meanings.definition: A synthetic progestin used in oral contraceptives.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed norethindrones to prevent pregnancy.
meanings.sent2: Many women rely on norethindrones as a birth control method.
meanings.sent3: Taking norethindrones daily keeps the stork away!
meanings.sent4: Norethindrones acts like a guardian shield against unwanted pregnancies.
meanings.sent5: The tiny norethindrones work silently to stop baby surprises.

meanings.definition: A medication used to treat endometriosis.
meanings.sent1: She felt relief after starting the norethindrones treatment.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended norethindrones for her endometriosis.
meanings.sent4: The norethindrones pill fought against the endometriosis enemy.
meanings.sent5: Her pain lessened thanks to the healing power of norethindrones.

meanings.definition: A hormone used in hormone replacement therapy.
meanings.sent1: Norethindrones helps balance hormones during therapy.
meanings.sent2: The doctor suggested norethindrones for hormone replacement.
meanings.sent3: Her body welcomed norethindrones like a hormone hug.
meanings.sent4: Norethindrones steps in as the hormone backup dancer.
meanings.sent5: The magic of norethindrones restores hormonal harmony.
